testcase.classname: As a user, I should be able to access the financial information of the customer via API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request is sent to the /api/profile/get-customer-data endpoint with invalid authorization credentials,

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: * The api user constructs the base url with the "invalid" token.............passed * The api user sets "api/profile/get-customer-data" path parameters.........passed * The api user saves the response returned from the api profile get customer data endpoint and confirms that the status code is '401' and the message is Unauthorized..undefined * The api user saves the response returned from the api profile get customer data endpoint and confirms that the status code is '401' and the error message is 'Unauthorized'..skipped
